acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This holding was purchased on February 25, 1963.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In a letter, dated July 19, 1890, Hallock offers W.S. Chase a job as night editor of the New York Journal of Commercefor $12.00 a week. Collection also inclues a print of Hallock (ca. 1855), from a photograph by Mathew Brady.
In this letter to W.S. Chase, Gerard Hallock offers the job of night editor at the New York Journal of Commerceat $12 per week and stresses the need to accept immediately.
Gerard Hallock, head and shoulders, from photograph by Mathew Brady.
